              <div class="Grid-cell">
                <div class="ProfileSidebar ProfileSidebar--withLeftAlignment">
  <div class="ProfileHeaderCard">
  <h1 class="ProfileHeaderCard-name">
    <a href="/JohnCryerMP" class="ProfileHeaderCard-nameLink u-textInheritColor js-nav">John Cryer</a>
  </h1>

  <h2 class="ProfileHeaderCard-screenname u-inlineBlock u-dir" dir="ltr">
    <a class="ProfileHeaderCard-screennameLink u-linkComplex js-nav" href="/JohnCryerMP">
      <span class="username u-dir" dir="ltr">@<b class="u-linkComplex-target">JohnCryerMP</b></span>
    </a>
  </h2>

  

      <p class="ProfileHeaderCard-bio u-dir" dir="ltr">Labour MP for Leyton &amp; Wanstead. Please email me at john.cryer.mp@parliament.uk if you want a reply in more than 140 characters</p>

      <div class="ProfileHeaderCard-location u-hidden">
        <span class="Icon Icon--geo Icon--medium" aria-hidden="true" role="presentation"></span>

        </span>
      </div>

    johncryermp.co.uk
  </a>

</span>
      </div>

    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo like">
      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>
      <div class="HeartAnimation"></div>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Liked</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">6</span>
  </span>

  </button>
</div>

    <span class="FullNameGroup">
      <strong class="fullname show-popup-with-id u-textTruncate ">Wes Streeting MP</strong><span></span><span class="UserBadges"><span class="Icon Icon--verified"><span class="u-hiddenVisually">Verified account</span></span></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr">@<b>wesstreeting</b></span></a>

        
        <small class="time">

  </div>

      </div>

</li>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

      

      


      
        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">My latest newsletter is now on my website: <a href="https://t.co/uIN2P8QK6G" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="http://johncryer.co.uk/docs/news/239.pdf" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="http://johncryer.co.uk/docs/news/239.pdf"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">http://</span><span class="js-display-url">johncryer.co.uk/docs/news/239.</span><span class="invisible">pdf</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">4</span>
  </span>

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo js-actionButton js-actionRetweet" data-modal="ProfileTweet-retweet" type="button">
    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo retweet">
      <span class="Icon Icon--medium Icon--retweet"></span>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Retweeted</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">4</span>
  </span>

  </button>
</div>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">John Cryer Retweeted Leyton Orient Fans' Trust - LOFT</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Yet another example of laissez-faire football governance not working. We need a robust, genuine "fit and proper person" test for club owners<a href="https://t.co/k2nY0PUCVh" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/LOFansTrust/status/915173463819735041" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/LOFansTrust/status/915173463819735041"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/LOFansTrust/st</span><span class="invisible">atus/915173463819735041</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">John Cryer added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">
    <a class="QuoteTweet-link js-nav" href="/LOFansTrust/status/915173463819735041" data-conversation-id="915173463819735041" aria-hidden="true">
    </a>
    <div class="QuoteTweet-innerContainer u-cf js-permalink js-media-container" data-item-id="915173463819735041" data-item-type="tweet" data-screen-name="LOFansTrust" data-user-id="421182790" href="/LOFansTrust/status/915173463819735041" data-conversation-id="915173463819735041" tabindex="0">
      <div class="tweet-content">
        <div class="QuoteTweet-authorAndText u-alignTop">
            
  <div class="QuoteTweet-originalAuthor u-cf u-textTruncate stream-item-header account-group js-user-profile-link">
    <b class="QuoteTweet-fullname u-linkComplex-target">Leyton Orient Fans' Trust - LOFT</b><span class="UserBadges"></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr">@<b>LOFansTrust</b></span>
  </div>

          
          
          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">Another club, but the same old issues of "an inadequate regulatory regime" leaving fans concerned about the long-term future of their club. <span rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/SuppDirect/status/915155142105817093" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/SuppDirect/status/915155142105817093"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/SuppDirect/sta</span><span class="invisible">tus/915155142105817093</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></span></div>

</li><li class="js-stream-item stream-item stream-item&#10;" data-item-id="895913936264077314" id="stream-item-tweet-895913936264077314" data-item-type="tweet" data-suggestion-json="{&quot;suggestion_details&quot;:{},&quot;tweet_ids&quot;:&quot;895913936264077314&quot;,&quot;scribe_component&quot;:&quot;tweet&quot;}">

  <div class="tweet js-stream-tweet js-actionable-tweet js-profile-popup-actionable dismissible-content&#10;       original-tweet js-original-tweet&#10;      &#10;      &#10;       &#10;" data-tweet-id="894940402444369921" data-item-id="894940402444369921" data-permalink-path="/JohnCryerMP/status/894940402444369921" data-conversation-id="894940402444369921" data-tweet-nonce="894940402444369921-76fde2b2-a6cc-4c26-8614-a63d85283d8e" data-tweet-stat-initialized="true" data-screen-name="JohnCryerMP" data-name="John Cryer" data-user-id="2979904613" data-you-follow="false" data-follows-you="false" data-you-block="false" data-mentions="LauraPidcockMP" data-reply-to-users-json="[{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;2979904613&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;JohnCryerMP&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;John Cryer&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;John Cryer&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;John Cryer&quot;}},{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;251821643&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;LauraPidcockMP&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Laura Pidcock MP&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Laura Pidcock MP&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Laura Pidcock MP&quot;}}]" data-disclosure-type="">

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">John Cryer Retweeted Laura Pidcock MP</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Co-signed this letter from <a href="/LauraPidcockMP" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="251821643"><s>@</s><b>LauraPidcockMP</b></a> about UC rollout which could affect L&amp;W families in the run up to Christmas.<a href="https://t.co/iyie4fOQhV" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/LauraPidcockMP/status/894533510932942848" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/LauraPidcockMP/status/894533510932942848"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/LauraPidcockMP</span><span class="invisible">/status/894533510932942848</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">John Cryer added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">
    <a class="QuoteTweet-link js-nav" href="/LauraPidcockMP/status/894533510932942848" data-conversation-id="894533510932942848" aria-hidden="true">
    </a>
    <div class="QuoteTweet-innerContainer u-cf js-permalink js-media-container" data-item-id="894533510932942848" data-item-type="tweet" data-screen-name="LauraPidcockMP" data-user-id="251821643" href="/LauraPidcockMP/status/894533510932942848" data-conversation-id="894533510932942848" tabindex="0">
      <div class="tweet-content">
            <div class="QuoteMedia">
      <div class="QuoteMedia-container js-quote-media-container">
          <div class="QuoteMedia-singlePhoto">
    <div class="QuoteMedia-photoContainer js-quote-photo" data-image-url="https://pbs.twimg.com/media/DGoFd2WWAAEAhPb.jpg" data-element-context="platform_photo_card" style="background-color:rgba(64,10,14,1.0);" data-dominant-color="[64,10,14]">

  </div>

        <div class="QuoteTweet-authorAndText u-alignTop">
            
  <div class="QuoteTweet-originalAuthor u-cf u-textTruncate stream-item-header account-group js-user-profile-link">
    <b class="QuoteTweet-fullname u-linkComplex-target">Laura Pidcock MP</b><span class="UserBadges"><span class="Icon Icon--verified"><span class="u-hiddenVisually">Verified account</span></span></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr">@<b>LauraPidcockMP</b></span>
  </div>

          
          
          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">The UC rollout over Christmas will cause immense distress in our communities. That's why we are asking for <span class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="2230539338"><s>@</s><b>DavidGauke</b></span> to <span data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>stoptherollout</b></span>. <span class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/BKw5ACQWag</span></div>
        </div>
      </div>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Employment tribunal fees unlawful, Supreme Court rules.

Well done UNISON.<img class="Emoji Emoji--forText" src="https://abs.twimg.com/emoji/v2/72x72/1f44f-1f3fd.png" draggable="false" alt="" title="Clapping hands sign (Medium skin tone)" aria-label="Emoji: Clapping hands sign (Medium skin tone)" />

<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">John Cryer added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">
    <a class="QuoteTweet-link js-nav" href="/bilal_labour/status/872757585820233729" data-conversation-id="872757585820233729" aria-hidden="true">

<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Why is there always a magic money tree for tax cuts for very wealthiest individuals and corporations? Terrible response on nurses' pay.<a href="https://t.co/Kl7Si8qTtU" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/jamesmelville/status/870770894146285568" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/jamesmelville/status/870770894146285568"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/jamesmelville/</span><span class="invisible">status/870770894146285568</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>

  </span>

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo ProfileTweet-action--unfavorite u-linkClean js-actionButton js-actionFavorite" type="button">
    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo like">
      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>
      <div class="HeartAnimation"></div>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Liked</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">

      <div class="stream-item-header">
          <a class="account-group js-account-group js-action-profile js-user-profile-link js-nav" href="/JohnCryerMP" data-user-id="2979904613">

      <li class="copy-link-to-tweet js-actionCopyLinkToTweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Copy link to Tweet</button>
      </li>
      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">

      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

  </div>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Jo was a lovely, warm &amp; committed person. The PLP &amp; colleagues across Parliament feel utterly shattered by this news. RIP Jo.</p>
</div>

          <div class="action-confirmation dismiss-module-item">Thanks. Twitter will use this info to make your timeline better.
            <span class="undo-action">Undo</span>

      </div>
  </button>
  <div class="dropdown-menu is-autoCentered">

    <div class="caret-outer"></div>

  </div>
  <ul>

  <ul>
    
      <li class="copy-link-to-tweet js-actionCopyLinkToTweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Copy link to Tweet</button>
      </li>
      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

    <div class="ProfileTweet-action ProfileTweet-action--reply">
  <button class="ProfileTweet-actionButton js-actionButton js-actionReply" data-modal="ProfileTweet-reply" type="button" aria-describedby="profile-tweet-action-reply-count-aria-657544316718567424">

    <div class="ProfileTweet-action ProfileTweet-action--retweet js-toggleState js-toggleRt">

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo ProfileTweet-action--unfavorite u-linkClean js-actionButton js-actionFavorite" type="button">
    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo like">
      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>
      <div class="HeartAnimation"></div>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Liked</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">1</span>
  </span>

  </button>

      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

      

      


      
        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Dangerous announcement in the House of Lords goes unnoticed. We can fix that. Please RT and contact your MP about it<a href="https://t.co/FTT7HDzhNw" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://opendemocracy.net/ournhs/richard-grimes/government-moves-to-consider-nhs-user-charges" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://opendemocracy.net/ournhs/richard-grimes/government-moves-to-consider-nhs-user-charges"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">opendemocracy.net/ournhs/richard</span><span class="invisible">-grimes/government-moves-to-consider-nhs-user-charges</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Like</span>

  </span>

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo ProfileTweet-action--unfavorite u-linkClean js-actionButton js-actionFavorite" type="button">

      </li>
  </ul>

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Further to my last tweet - please call <a href="/RAMFELCharity" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="42581495"><s>@</s><b>RAMFELCharity</b></a> before turning up at a class.   </ul>

        <div class="feedback-action" data-feedback-type="DontLike" data-feedback-url="">
          <div class="action-confirmation dismiss-module-item">Thanks. Twitter will use this info to make your timeline better.
            <span class="undo-action">Undo</span>

      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Like</span>
    </div>

  </span>

      <button type="button" class="modal-btn modal-close js-close">
  <span class="Icon Icon--close Icon--medium">
    <span class="visuallyhidden">Close</span>
  </span>
</button>

      <div class="modal-header">

  <p class="embed-video-instructions">Add this video to your website by copying the code below. <a href="https://dev.twitter.com/web/embedded-tweets" target="_blank" rel="noopener">Learn more</a></p>

    window.ttft.recordMilestone('page', document.getElementById('swift-page-name').getAttribute('content'));
    window.ttft.recordMilestone('section', document.getElementById('swift-section-name').getAttribute('content'));
    window.ttft.recordMilestone('client_record_time', window.ttft.now());
  }
